name: GoodReads Dark Sans
description: Dark theme for GoodReads using warm greys, blues, purple and inverted existing images. Please see also GoodReads Dark Sans Background Book-Stack add-on.
additional_info: PLEASE NOTE: this theme was broken after updates on GoodReads.com and I'm currently attempting to re-write the theme from scratch, and pulling sections from my earlier work. The process is a bit slow, but I think it's getting there. (Please note, this is a work in progress, not all aspects of GoodReads have been addressed) >>> As always, constructive feedback is appreciated <<< Maintenance Release: 3.00.03 - 20201106 - minor adjustments from local edits Update Release: 3.00.02 - 20180323 - fixed background color Beta Release: 3.00.01 - 20160325 - ToolTip pop-ups colored - Search Tabs colored - Reading Challenge 2016 icon - further color corections Beta Release: 3.00.00 - 20160324 - Re-write beginning - Color variables copied - Introduced from prior: - Tabs - Brown Background - Quote of the Day - Popups Beta Release: 2.00.04 - 20160208 - Fix shaded rows: Ad Mention Book Results pop-up Beta Release: 2.00.03 - 20160105 - Several normalizations of author/title color - More links found with default "too-dark" - 2015 in review minor updates for readability Beta Release: 2.00.02 - 20160102 - Author name fixed (too dark) (reported by eddiejf321) Beta Release: 2.00.01 - 20150806 - protoTip boxes updated; gray outline - protoTip_stemImage replaced with protoTip_Stem style - navButtonArror rgba colored - previewButton colored more subtly - buttonBar changed from light purple to ocean Beta Release: 2.00.00 - 20150804 - Split out the book-stack graphic into this style add-on. - Quote of the day - Shelf chooser and graphic radio buttons - minor additions: author name, quote text, book title, user name, by Alpha Release: 1.00.06 - 20150730 - Beginning to normalize colors - Using CSS variables Alpha Release: 1.00.05 - 20150727 - User Profile recolored - Book Review Form recolored - Left column stack of books Alpha Release: 1.00.04 - 20150725 - ProtoTips recolored - Button outlines fixed! - Testing with Chrome Alpha Release: 1.00.03 - 20150723 - Login page recolored - Header graphic updated Alpha Release: 1.00.02 - 20150722 - New "stars" graphics - Tab elements recolored - Recommendation filter recolored - Large "search box" recolored Alpha Release: 1.00.01 - 20150721 - Continued "Want to Read" button coloring - Colored pop-up block - Colored description links w/ dotted-underline - Site header drop-down menu Alpha Release: 1.00.00 - 20150721 Initial Notes: Some elements - such as the green bookshelf buttons - have not yet been skinned. Identifying of shading and gradient elements used by GoodReads are a challenge. Initial rounds are being developed/tested using FireFox; additional browsers will be used for testing. -=- -=- -=- -=- -=- -=- -=- -=- -=- -=- -=- -=- -=- -=- -=- -=- -=- -=- -=- -=- To Do: [_] define and normalize color pallet [_] test with other browsers [_] can't seem to fix the Audible links; appear after page load through js
